changed_products.title: Safety Retractable Belt Barrier - WeatherMaster 250 - 2 pack bundle 2.6m/3.4m/3.9m Belt
Belt Barrier 2 Pack - Black/Polished Stainless/Satin Stainless Retractable Belt Barriers - 2.6m/3.4m/3.9m Belt

title: Belt Barrier 2 Pack - Black/Polished Stainless/Satin Stainless Post Retractable Belt Barriers - 2.6m/3.4m/3.9m Belt
Belt Barrier 2 Pack - Black/Polished Stainless/Satin Stainless Retractable Belt Barriers - 2.6m/3.4m/3.9m Belt
description: Product OverviewThis QueueMaster retractable belt barrier pack provides a high quality, low cost solution for forming customer queues. This free ship bundle is available with 5cm wide, 2.6m to 3.9m belt options in over 40 different stock colours. The belt features a slow retracting brake system along with a locking belt end. Supplied with a full circumference floor protector to prevent floor damage.

Retractable Belt Barrier Pack – Product Overview

The Retractable Belt Barrier Pack from QueueMaster provides a reliable and cost-effective solution for forming clear customer queues. It suits retail stores, venues, transport hubs and public buildings. Moreover, this bundled pack helps you manage foot traffic efficiently while keeping costs under control. As a result, you achieve professional queue control with minimal setup effort.

Reliable Performance with Flexible Belt Options

Each Retractable Belt Barrier Pack includes posts fitted with 5cm wide retractable belts. You can choose belt lengths from 2.6m to 3.9m, which allows wider spacing between posts. Consequently, you reduce the number of barriers needed while keeping queue lines neat and organised. The belt cassette also includes a slow-retracting brake system. Therefore, belt retraction remains smooth and controlled during daily use.

Designed for Safety and Floor Protection

Safety and durability remain a key focus of this Retractable Belt Barrier Pack. Each post includes a locking belt end to prevent accidental release once connected. In addition, the heavy base provides stability in busy areas. A full-circumference rubber floor protector also helps prevent scratches and scuffs on hard flooring. As a result, the barriers suit high-traffic environments such as shops, museums and airports.

Wide Choice of Colours and Customisation

This Belt Barrier Pack of 2 is available in over forty stock belt colours. These options include solid colours and standard safety messages. Furthermore, custom printing is available if you need branded belts or specific instructions. Because of this flexibility, you can match the barriers to your branding or wayfinding requirements without difficulty.

This Retractable Belt Barrier Pack is Ideal for Many Environments

You can use this pack in retail queues, reception areas, exhibitions and event entrances. Additionally, it works well in transport settings such as airports and stations. The modular design allows you to expand or reconfigure layouts as foot traffic changes throughout the day. Therefore, the system adapts easily to both temporary and permanent queue setups.

View compatible sign frames to improve queue guidance.
Browse our full range of retractable belt barriers to complete your setup.

For official guidance on safe crowd management, visit the HSE crowd management advice.

20m Black Retractable Air Hose Reel - Durable PU, 217psi, Auto-Retract, C-Type Connector, Industrial Use
Steel Barricade In Purple - 1.8m Compact Metal Barricade With Removable Feet
Value Yellow Belt Barrier - Safety Retractable Barrier Post - 3.65m Yellow Belt

description: Product OverviewWe have developed our Value Series site safety belt barriers to provide a range of budget-friendly barrier posts without compromise on quality. Our Value Series yellow belt barrier has all the features of higher priced stanchions at an unbeatable price. This model features our highest selling yellow finish option with a 50mm wide 3.65m long belt. Each belt length is available in 2 different stock colours. The belt features a slow retracting brake system and the belt end is compatible with most major brands. Supplied with a full circumference floor protector to prevent floor damage. Our site safety belt barriers are easy to assemble - no tools required!

Site Safety Belt Barriers – Product Overview

Our Site Safety Belt Barriers provide a reliable and cost-effective way to control access in busy work environments. Specifically developed as part of our Value Series range, these barriers deliver strong performance without unnecessary cost. Moreover, they retain the essential features found on higher-priced models. As a result, you gain dependable site safety control while staying within budget.

Value Series Design with Practical Safety Features

Each Site Safety Belt Barrier features our best-selling yellow post finish for maximum visibility. Additionally, the 50mm wide belt extends to 3.65m, which allows you to span wider areas with fewer posts. Furthermore, each belt length is available in two stock colour options, helping you match site requirements. Because the system uses a slow-retracting brake, belt rewind remains smooth and controlled. Therefore, the risk of snap-back injuries is reduced.

Easy Setup and Compatible Belt Ends

These Site Safety Belt Barriers are quick and simple to assemble. In fact, no tools are required, which saves time during setup. The belt end is also compatible with most major barrier brands. Consequently, you can integrate these posts easily into existing layouts. In addition, the full-circumference rubber floor protector helps prevent scuffs and marks on finished surfaces.

Ideal for Busy Work and Cleaning Zones

Because of their clear colour and reliable construction, these barriers suit a wide range of applications. For example, they work well on construction sites, factory floors, warehouses and cleaning zones. Moreover, the lightweight design makes repositioning quick when layouts change. Therefore, teams can respond faster to evolving site conditions while maintaining clear safety boundaries.

Why Choose Our Site Safety Belt Barriers?
  • ☑ High-visibility yellow finish for clear safety marking
  • ☑ 50mm wide 3.65m retractable belt
  • ☑ Slow-retract brake for safer operation
  • ☑ Belt ends compatible with most major brands
  • ☑ Full-circumference floor protector
  • ☑ Tool-free assembly for fast deployment

See our full range of site safety belt barriers here.
For official guidance on safe site layouts, visit the HSE advice here.
